Title: Prohibits the manufacture, sale, and use of wire grill brushes
Summary: Prohibits the manufacture, sale, and use of wire grill brushes.
LawCode: Add Art 37 Title 13 §§37-1301 - 37-1307, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the manufacture, sale, and use of wire grill brushes
